description:
L’Oréal will leverage IBM’s generative AI (GenAI) technology to create innovative and sustainable cosmetic products. The partnership will involve developing a bespoke AI foundation model to supercharge L’Oréal’s Research & Innovation (R&I) teams in creating eco-friendly formulations using renewable raw materials. In turn, this initiative is designed to reduce both energy and material waste. Described... Read more »

The post L’Oréal: Making cosmetics sustainable with generative AI appeared first on AI News.
title: L’Oréal: Making cosmetics sustainable with generative AI
